ui.label: Exists
ui.description: Returns a status whether or not items or query rows exist

ui.label: Metadata
ui.description: Returns metadata about items or queries

ui.label: Aggregate
ui.description: Returns some aggregate data related to items or queries

ui.label: Read
ui.description: Returns data or contents related to an item

ui.label: Write
ui.description: Allows for the writing of data or contents related to an item

ui.label: Admin
ui.description: Provides some adminstration functions to control how items are published or shared
